title: A Kiss to Build a Dream On
script_text: Louis, what kind of romantic dream are you building here? With just one kiss as the foundation - that takes trust and faith in love. Here's Louis Armstrong with A Kiss to Build a Dream On.
original_issue: Too flowery/poetic - needs grounded conversational tone
human_notes: Much better - conversational rhetorical question and grounded language. Trust/faith theme fits Julie's character.

title: Ain't Misbehavin'
script_text: Well, ain't we all just a bunch of rebels at heart? I mean it - check out the title: "Ain't Misbehavin'"! That saucy swing is irresistible. Here's that charmingly defiant tune by Fats Waller for you now â€“ Ain't Misbehavin'.
original_issue: Too aggressive/preachy - needs smooth lounge host tone
human_notes: Good improvement - playful opening with smooth delivery. 'Saucy swing' and 'charmingly defiant' capture the vibe without being preachy.
